original: Erikson, John Olof, direktör, Borås, f. 1/9/87 i Rydboholm, Älvsb. 1. G. 22 m. Ingeborg Karlson. Barn: Rut f. 22, Sven 24, Olof 27, Gunhild 32. — Stud:ex. i Gbg 07, DHS 18. Tj :-man v. Kinnaströms Väfveri A-B i Kinna 18-20, kamr. v. Rydboho/lms A-B 21-26, v. verkst. dir. där 26-36, verkst. dir. f. A-B John Erikison & Co. i Borås sed. 36. Led. av styr. f. Kinnaströms Väfveri A-B o. Rydahls Manufaktur A-B.
translated: Erikson, John Olof, Director, Borås, b. 1/9/87 in Rydboholm, Älvsborg. 1st Marriage: Married in 1922 to Ingeborg Karlson. Children: Rut b. 1922, Sven b. 1924, Olof b. 1927, Gunhild b. 1932. Education: Studied in Gothenburg graduating in 1907, DHS in 1918. Worked as a clerk for Kinnaströms Väfveri A-B in Kinna from 1918-1920, became a superintendent at Rydboholms A-B from 1921-1926, deputy managing director from 1926-1936 and managing director of A-B John Erikson & Co. in Borås since 1936. He was a board member of Kinnaströms Väfveri A-B and Rydahls Manufaktur A-B.
